name: The Internet War
description:
This strategy style game is best played against a friend or enemy on the same computer. Each player takes turns representing their favorite internet icon, visiting different web domains and gaining popularity. Since this game is currently in prototype phase, the current goal is to reach an exact score of 255 followers. Don't go over the limit though! Otherwise your score starts over and you have to begin again, giving your opponent a hefty advantage.

Use the arrow keys to move and 'Z' to interact with the surrounding environment
